text: Bertrand Russell and Alfred Whitehead publish Principia Mathematica
Pitts reads Principia Mathematica in Detroit and writes to Russell
Pitts runs away from home to University of Chicago, attends Russell's lectures
Lettvin introduces Pitts to Warren McCulloch
Pitts and McCulloch publish “A Logical Calculus of Ideas Immanent in Nervous Activity”
Lettvin introduces Pitts to Norbert Wiener
Wiener introduces Pitts to John von Neumann
von Neumann publishes First Draft of a Report on the EDVAC
Wiener severs ties with Pitts and Lettvin
Pitts, McCulloch, and Humberto Maturana publish “What the Frog's Eye Tells the Frog's Brain”
